info.title: Get in Touch
info.description: Choose the best way to reach us. We usually respond within 24 hours (business days).

q1.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
q1.answer: We typically respond within 24 business hours. For urgent issues, please contact us by phone.

q2.question: I’m an installer/company — how do I join FloorOneX?
q2.answer: Use the contact form and select a subject like “Join as an Installer”. We’ll guide you through verification, profile setup, and how to start receiving leads.

q3.question: Can I request a quote for a flooring job?
q3.answer: Yes. Send your location, flooring type (laminate/LVT/wood/carpet), approximate area (m²), and preferred timeline. We’ll connect you with suitable installers.
